name: Euro Truck Simulator: Gold Edition
summary: Euro Truck Simulator: Gold Edition is a special edition of the first installment of the iconic truck simulation game developed by SCS Software, offering players an enhanced gaming experience. In this game, you take on the role of a truck driver, traveling the roads of Europe and delivering various cargo to dozens of cities. Realistic physics, detailed truck models, and carefully crafted landscapes create the feeling of an actual journey across European highways. Dynamic time of day and weather changes make each trip unique, while the economic system allows you to build your career by earning money for new trucks and routes. The Gold Edition includes additional roads and regions that expand the game world, providing even more opportunities for exploration. Managing your truck, planning routes, and wisely allocating resources become key elements of gameplay, making Euro Truck Simulator: Gold Edition the perfect choice for anyone who wants to experience life as a long-distance truck driver.
